docs: # App account for every protocol Application
2.  `is_profile_delete_allowed`: Specifies the permission to delete a Profile

14. `creation_year`: App creation seachable number of year
15. `creation_month`: App creation seachable number of month
16. `app_domain_name`: Unique Application domain name (ID) as string (ASCII alphanumeric)
18. `registering_processor`: An address of an external processor for additional processing during Profile creation
19. `connecting_processor`: An address of an external processor for additional processing during Profile connection
20. `publishing_processor`: An address of an external processor for additional processing during Publication creation
21. `collecting_processor`: An address of an external processor for additional processing during Publication collection
22. `referencing_processor`: An address of an external processor for additional processing during Publication referencing

fields.name: isProfileDeleteAllowed
docs: Specifies the permission to delete a Profile.

fields.name: isSubspaceDeleteAllowed
docs: Specifies the permission to delete a Subspace.

fields.name: isPublicationDeleteAllowed
docs: Specifies the permission to delete a Publication.

fields.name: isProfileIndividualProcessorsAllowed
docs: Specifies the permission to assign Profile's individual external processors.

docs: Specifies the permission to assign Subspace's individual external processors.

fields.name: isPublicationIndividualProcessorsAllowed
docs: Specifies the permission to assign Publication's individual external processors.

fields.name: metadataUri
docs: URI of the metadata (1 + STRING_LENGTH_PREFIX + MAX_URI_LENGTH).

fields.name: registeringProcessor
docs: An address of an external processor for additional processing during Profile creation.

fields.name: connectingProcessor
docs: An address of an external processor for additional processing during Profile connection.

fields.name: publishingProcessor

accounts.name: Profile
docs: Profile account that holds data about Application user
24. Profile birth date as unix timestamp (rounded to date)
27. Profile birth seachable number of year
31. Profile creation seachable number of year
32. Profile creation seachable number of month
33. Profile creation seachable number of week
34. Profile creation seachable number of day
35. Unique Application's user Profile Alias as string (ASCII alphanumeric)

fields.name: connectingProcessor
docs: An address of a Program (external processor) for Connection additional processing (33)

fields.name: modifiedAt
docs: The optional Unix timestamp of the Profile modification (1 + 8)

accounts.name: Subspace
docs: The Subspace is an account (PDA) that holds data about a application Subspace (e.g. group / "public")
12. Subspace creation seachable number of year
13. Subspace creation seachable number of month
14. Subspace creation seachable number of week
15. Subspace creation seachable number of day
16. Unique application's user profile alias as string (optional, ASCII alphanumeric) (optional)

fields.name: publishingProcessor
docs: An address of a Program (external processor) for Publication Creating additional processing (1 + 32)

fields.name: connectingProcessor
docs: An address of a Program (external processor) for profiles Connection additional processing (1 + 32)

fields.name: collectingProcessor
docs: An address of a Program (external processor) for Publication Collecting additional processing (1 + 32)

fields.name: referencingProcessor
docs: An address of a Program (external processor) for Publication referencing additional processing (1 + 32)

accounts.name: SubspaceManager
docs: SubspaceManager account that holds data about Subspace management team user

accounts.name: Publication
docs: The Publication is account (PDA) that holds Application's Publication data
1.  Existing Protocol Application in which Publication was created
4.  Whether or not the publication has encrypted content
5.  Whether or not the Publication is mirroring other existing Publication (e.g. re-post)
6.  Whether or not the Publication is replying to other existing Publication (e.g. comment)
9.  References to existing Publication if there is a mirror or reply
10. Subspace in which Publication being published
13. Publication creation searchable number of week
15. Publication creation searchable number of day

fields.name: isEncrypted
docs: Whether or not the publication has encrypted content

fields.name: isMirror
docs: Flag to determine whether publication is mirror (e.g. 'repost') (1)

fields.name: isReply
docs: Flag to determine whether publication is reply (e.g. 'comment') (1)

fields.name: targetPublication
docs: Pubkey that specify target in case Publication is a mirror or reply (32), default value if not mirror or reply

fields.name: subspace
docs: Subspace to publish, default value if publishing in profile space

fields.name: metadataUri
docs: The URI of the publication metadata(STRING_LENGTH_PREFIX + MAX_URI_LENGTH)

fields.name: collectingProcessor
docs: An address of a Program (external processor) for Publication Collecting additional processing (1 + 32)

fields.name: referencingProcessor
docs: An address of a Program (external processor) for Publication Referencing additional processing (1 + 32)

fields.name: createdAt
docs: Unix timestamp of the Publication creation (8)

fields.name: modifiedAt
docs: The optional Unix timestamp of the Publication modification (1 + 8)

accounts.name: Connection
docs: Connection account holds data about Connection between two Application's entities (e.g. following)
5. Target Application's Profile/Subspace address (e.g. which initializer followed)
6. Whether or not Connection is approved by target (e.g. accept friend request)
8. Connection creation searchable number of day

fields.name: target
docs: Connection target Pubkey (might be another Profile or Application Subspace) (32)

fields.name: isApproved
docs: Flag to determine whether Connection is approved by target entitty (e.g. accept friend request or private group acceptance) (1)

accounts.name: CollectionItem
docs: CollectionItem account that creates when some Profile collects some Application Entity (e.g. Publication)
8. CollectionItem creation searchable number of day

fields.name: createdAt
docs: Unix timestamp of the CollectionItem creation (8)

accounts.name: Alias
docs: Alias account that creates when new Alias is claimed by user Profile or Subspace
2. Profile which the alias belongs to

accounts.name: Reaction
docs: Reaction account that creates when new Publication Reaction initialized
10. Reaction creation searchable number of day

fields.name: createdAt
docs: Unix timestamp of the Reaction creation (8)

accounts.name: Report
docs: Report account that creates when new Report initialized
10. Report creation searchable number of day

fields.name: createdAt
docs: Unix timestamp of the Report creation (8)

types.name: AppData
docs: The struct contains data for the application instruction.
- `metadata_uri`: The optional metadata URI for the app.
- `is_profile_delete_allowed`: Specifies the permission to delete a Profile.
- `is_subspace_delete_allowed`: Specifies the permission to delete a Subspace.
- `is_publication_delete_allowed`: Specifies the permission to delete a Publication.
- `is_profile_individual_processors_allowed`: Specifies the permission to assign Profile's individual external processors.
- `is_subspace_individual_processors_allowed`: Specifies the permission to assign Subspace's individual external processors.
- `is_publication_individual_processors_allowed`: Specifies the permission to assign Publication's individual external processors.

types.name: ProfileData
docs: 1.  `alias` - Unique Application's user Profile Alias as string (ASCII alphanumeric)

types.name: SubspaceData
docs: 1. `alias` - Unique Application's Subspace Alias as string (ASCII alphanumeric) (optional)

types.name: PublicationData
docs: 1. `is_encrypted` - Whether or not the publication has encrypted content
3. `is_mirror` - Whether or not the publication is mirroring other existing publication (e.g. re-post)
4. `is_reply` - Whether or not the publication is replying to other existing publication (e.g. comment)

types.name: ConnectionTargetType
docs: Connection Target type (e.g. Profile or Subspace)

types.name: ContentType
docs: 1. Article - Article type (e.g. - mixed content / blog post)
4. Short video - Shor video file type

errors.name: ProcessorNameInvalid
errors.msg: Processor name must contain only ASCII letters in lower case and numbers

errors.name: ProcessorNotWhitelisted
errors.msg: Procesor trying to use is not whitelisted

errors.name: AppDomainNameLengthIncorrect
errors.msg: Application domain name (ID) length is incorrect

errors.name: AppDomainNameInvalid
errors.msg: Application domain name must contain only ASCII letters in lower case and numbers

errors.name: MissingRequiredField
errors.msg: Missing field required by Application settings

errors.name: ActionProhibitedByAppSettings
errors.msg: The action is prohibited by application settings

errors.name: AliasInvalid
errors.msg: Alias must contain only ASCII letters in lower case, numbers and underscores

errors.name: AliasAccountRequired
errors.msg: Alias account required to register action

errors.name: AliasAccountsMustBeNone
errors.msg: Alias accounts must not be passed

errors.name: BothAliasAccountRequired
errors.msg: Both alias account required to update

errors.name: CurrentAliasAccountRequired
errors.msg: Current alias account required to delete

errors.name: ProfileFirstNameLengthIncorrect
errors.msg: Profile first name length is incorrect

errors.name: ProfileLastNameLengthIncorrect
errors.msg: Profile last name length is incorrect

errors.name: BothMirrorAndReplyNotAllowed
errors.msg: Both mirroring and replying not allowed in the same time

errors.name: SelfPublicationCollecting
errors.msg: Forbidden to collect user's  own publication
